project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that fetches and displays the current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Set up Python environment and install required libraries
Implement the functionality to fetch weather data from the public API
Parse the fetched data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement a user prompt to allow input of the city name
Display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests to ensure that the fetching and parsing functions work correctly
Execute tests on the implemented functionality to ensure correctness and reliability
